name: Polly the Math Cow
description:
Polly - the math cow is the best friend and assistant in strengthening knowledge and skills in mathematics.

Application's main task: a fascinating process of training, performing in an entertaining, playful form, and colorful design and animation will surely please fidgets.

The application has a separate section where the results are located. Thanks to this you can observe the progress of your mathematician, as well as
will know when he needs help.
